name: Loot Table
description:
Github: King9999/Loot-Table: Not really a game, but a way for me to learn about JSON files (github.com)

This isn't really a game, but just something I came up with to teach myself about JSON. The program reads tables in a JSON file whenever a piece of loot needs to be generated. 

The rarity of the items goes up depending on which rank you choose. I use a simple weight system to determine drop rates for the items. If no item is dropped, you're given a bonus that makes it more likely to get an item next time. Sometimes, a rare enemy appears that improves your chances of getting an item drop, and you get a larger bonus if no item drops.

Monster sprites are from this asset pack: https://sorceressgamelab.itch.io/extended-monster-pack

Loot bag is from this asset pack: https://blodyavenger.itch.io/rpg-items-retro-pack
